name: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron's Workshop
name_original: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron's Workshop
description:
A bubble action game bustling with energy! Blow bubble after bubble then burst them with your horns or spines. Lock up your enemies and show them what’s what!
Don’t forget that bubbles will go wherever the wind takes them. That means you too can reach the highest heights by jumping onto them while they float!
The more you hone your skills, the better the experience!
Make your very own stage and share it with other players!

■Two modes are playable
・Story Mode
Main Story
Up to four friends can work together in this mode! Play on a bookshelf, on a bed, among toys, or in any of the other various stages of the game! Once you’ve finished Normal Mode, try your hand at Hard Mode with different enemies and stage designs.
Earn Chain Burst Bonuses by bursting clouds of adjacent bubbles with enemies inside. Aim for a high score using the wind to push bubbles together, ready for a Chain Burst!

Arcade of Memories(The original arcade version of Bubble Bobble)
Faithfully recreated from the original 1986 arcade game Bubble Bobble, this version allows up to two players to experience the nostalgia of old-school pixel art and riddle solving elements, along with the same hidden tricks and secret commands!

Arcade of the Future(The Baron is Back!)
Once you’ve played your way through 4 Friends mode, you’ll be able to try your hand at something more challenging. There are no continues in this far more difficult mode, but you will be able to fine-tune your skills in Training for each new stage. This mode supports up to four players. In place of Chain Burst Bonuses, you can get Time Bonuses if you are fast enough.

・Workshop Mode
Create your own stage by placing blocks, enemies and bubble-blowing wind too.
These stages can be played, uploaded for other players to enjoy and new stages created by other players can be downloaded too.

■New and Improved Gameplay!
・With an online ranking function for each mode, you can now contend with players around the world to see who has the highest score.
・Skills can be selected before playing Arcade of the Future in the Main Story. New Skills and extra Skill slots are unlocked with progress in the game.
・Continuing 3 times on the same stage of Main Story's Normal Mode allows you to continue with invincibility. You don't need to be an expert to enjoy it!
・Continue with invincibility is available from the start in Arcade of the Future's Training. Use it to practice strategies!
・In Arcade of Memories the screen ratio can be adjusted, and scanlines displayed for an authentic, Bubble Bobble arcade experience!
